item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-RiP - Blondie - The Old Grey Whistle Test, Apollo Theatre, Glasgow, UK, 1979 [1080p50] [caladan]
item.description:
This is an excellent Blondie recording. I downloaded it from BBC iPlayer.

Setlist:
1. Dreaming
2. Slow Motion
3. Shayla
4. Union City Blue
5. Atomic
6. Eat to the Beat
7. Picture This
8. Pretty Baby
9. Heart of Glass
10. Hanging on the Telephone
11. Sunday Girl
